ta\ peri\ th=s ei(marme/nhs  dokou=nq' h(mi=n, w(s  oi(=o/n

te safw=s kai\  sunto/mws  peira/somai e)pistei=lai/ soi,  fi/ltate  *pei/swn,  e)peidh\ su\  tou=t'  h)ci/wsas ou)k  a)gnow=n h(\n  e)/xw pro\s to\ gra/fein  eu)la/beian.

p.#text:
prw=ton toi/nun  i)/sqi, o(/ti ei(marme/nh  dixw=s
kai\ le/getai kai\  noei=tai: h( me\n ga/r e)stin  e)ne/rgeia
h( d' ou)si/a. prw=ton me\n ou)=n e)ne/rgeian tu/pw|  u(pe/grayen
o(  *pla/twn e)/n te tw=| *fai/drw| le/gwn  e)n de\ tw=| *timai/w| 
ou(\s e)pi\ th=| tou= panto\s fu/sei o( qeo\s  ei)=pe tai=s  a)qana/tois yuxai=s:

e)n de\ th=| *politei/a|  fhsi\n ei)=nai th\n ei(marme/nhn, ou)  tragikw=s a)lla\  qeologikw=s to\  a)re/skon au(tw=|  a)pofaino/menos.

ei) de\ koino/teron  e)qe/loi tis tau=ta  metalabw\n  u(pogra/yai, w(s me\n e)n *fai/drw|  le/goit' a)\n h( ei(marme/nh lo/gos qei=os  a)para/batos di' ai)ti/an  a)nempo/diston:
w(s d' e)n tw=| *timai/w| no/mos  a)ko/louqos th=| tou= panto\s fu/sei, kaq' o(\n  dieca/getai ta\ gigno/mena.
 tou=to ga\r e)kei= h( *la/xesis  e)rga/zetai, h( th=s *)ana/gkhs a)lhqw=s  quga/thr, w(s kai\ pro/teron  parela/bomen kai\
 u(/steron e)/ti ma=llon  ei)so/meq' e)n toi=s kata\  sxolh\n  lo/gois. h(/de me\n ou)=n h( kat' e)ne/rgeian ei(marme/nh.

h( de\ kat' ou)si/an e)/oiken ei)=nai  su/mpas' h( tou= ko/smou yuxh\  trixh=|  dianemhqei=sa,  ei)/s te th\n  a)planh=
 moi=ran kai\ ei)s th\n  plana=sqai  nomizome/nhn, kai\ tri/thn th\n  u(poura/nion th\n peri\ gh=n  u(pa/rxousan
w(=n me\n a)nwta/tw  *klwqw\ prosagoreu/etai, h( de\ met' au)th\n  *)/atropos, h(  katwta/tw d' au)= *la/xesis,  dexome/nh me\n ta\s  ou)rani/as tw=n  a)delfw=n  e)nergei/as,
  sumple/kousa de\ kai\  diadidou=sa  tau/tas ei)s ta\ e)p'
au)th=s  tetagme/na ta\ e)pi/geia. duna/mei me\n ou)=n ei)/rhtai,

kai\ ga\r h(/tis e)sti\ kai\  po/sh tis kai\ o(poi/a
kai\ o(/pws  te/taktai kai\ o(/pws e)/xei au)th/ te pro\s e(auth\n

e)n th=| *politei/a| metri/ws  ai)ni/ttetai, kai\  h(mei=s ei)s
du/nami/n soi  tau=t'  e)peira/qhmen  e)chgh/sasqai.

ta\
pro\s  a)/llhla  sumperanqe/nta  ta/xh  sxh=|  kefalh/n,

tw=| tou=  tau)tou= kai\  o(moi/ws  i)o/ntos  a)nametrhqe/nta ku/klw|.

p.#text:
pa/lin ge mh\n th\n kat' e)ne/rgeian ei(marme/nhn
  a)nalabo/ntes le/gwmen peri\ ga\r tau=ta ta\ polla\  zhth/mata
fusika/ te kai\  h)qika\ kai\  dialektika\ tugxa/nei
 o)/nta. ti/s me\n ou)=n e)stin,  e)pieikw=s a)fw/ristai: o(poi/a
d' e)sti/n, e(ch=s r(hte/on, ei) kai\  polloi=s  a)/topon fai/netai.  a)pei/rwn ga\r e)c  a)pei/rou kai\ ei)s a)/peiron
 o)/ntwn tw=n gignome/nwn, ta\ pa/nta  peribalou=s' e)n ku/klw| h( ei(marme/nh ou)k  a)/peiros; a)lla\  peperasme/nh e)sti/n ou)/te ga\r no/mos ou)/te lo/gos ou)/te ti  qei=on
 a)/peiron a)\n ei)/h. e)/ti d' a)\n ma/qois to\ lego/menon,  noh/sas th/n o(/lhn peri/odon kai\ to\n  su/mpanta  xro/non,
 w(/s fhsin o( *ti/maios
 e)n ga\r tou/tw| tw=| lo/gw|  w(risme/nw| t'  o)/nti kai\  qewroume/nw| pa/nq' o(/sa te kat' ou)rano\n a(\ t' e)pi\ th\n
 gh=n e)c a)na/gkhs  a)/nwqen  suni/statai, pa/lin me\n ei)s
tau)to\  katasth/setai, pa/lin d' e)c  a)rxh=s o(/la kata\

tau)ta\ w(sau/tws a)podoqh/setai.  mo/nh  gou=n h( kat' ou)rano\n  sxe/sis au)th/ te pro\s e(auth\n kata\ pa/nta  tetagme/nh pro/s te th\n gh=n kai\ pro\s ta\ e)pi/geia pa/nta dia\  makrw=n perio/dwn pa/lin  e)panh/cei pote/:  ai(/ te met' au)th\n  e)fech=s kai\  e)xo/menai  a)llh/lais  e)xome/nws
  pare/sontai,  e(ka/sth ta\  au(th=s e)c a)na/gkhs  fe/rousai. e)/stw de\ pro\s to\ safe\s tw=n peri\ h(ma=s nu=n o)/ntwn, o(/ti ou)  sumbai/nei a)po\ tw=n  ou)rani/wn, w(s pa/ntwn
  ai)tiw=n o)/ntwn, kai\ to\  e)me\ gra/fein  nuni\  ta/de kai\  w(di\ se/ te pra/ttein  a(/per kai\ o(/pws  tugxa/neis  pra/ttwn:
 pa/lin toi/nun  e)peida\n h( au)th\  a)fi/khtai ai)ti/a,
tau)ta\ kai\ w(sau/tws oi(  au)toi\  geno/menoi  pra/comen. ou(/tw
de\ kai\  pa/ntes  a)/nqrwpoi kai\ ta\ g' e(ch=s kata\ th\n e(ch=s ai)ti/an genh/setai kai\  praxqh/setai, kai\ pa/nq' o(/la
kai\ kata\  mi/an th\n o(/lhn peri/odon kai\ kaq' e(ka/sthn
 tw=n  o(/lwn w(sau/tws a)podoqh/setai. fanero\n toi/nun h)/dh o(/ ti e)/famen, th\n ei(marme/nhn a)/peiron tro/pon tina\  ou)=san mh\ a)/peiron ei)=nai, kai\ to/ ge  r(hqe/n, o(/ti ku/klos ti/s  e)sti, metri/ws  pou  katw=ptai: w(s ga\r kai\

gignome/nwn
o( lo/gos ku/klos a)\n  nomisqei/h.

q.#text:
qesmo/s te
*)adrastei/as o(/de: h(\tis a)\n yuxh\  sunopado\s genome/nh  kati/dh| ti tw=n  a)lhqw=n, me/xri th=s  e(te/ras  perio/dou ei)=nai  a)ph/mona: ka)\n a)ei\  du/nhtai tou=to  poiei=n, a)ei\
  a)blabh= ei)=nai.

p.#text:
sxedo\n me\n ou)=n kai\ tou=to dhloi=, o(poi=o/n ti tugxa/nei h( ei(marme/nh, plh\n ou)x h(/ ge kata\ me/ros

ou)d' h( kaq' e(/kasta.  poi/a tis ou)=n kai\ h(/de kat'
au)= to/de to\  ei)=dos tou=  lo/gou; e)/sti toi/nun, w(s a)/n tis  ei)ka/sai,  oi(=os o( politiko\s no/mos  o(\s prw=ton me\n ta\  plei=sta, ei) kai\ mh\ pa/nta, e)c u(poqe/sews prosta/ttei: e)/peita mh\n kaqo/lou ta\  po/lei  prosh/konta ei)s du/namin
 perilamba/nei. pa/lin de\ tou/twn e(ka/teron o(poi=o\n
ti/ e)sti, skepte/on.  a)kolou/qws toi/nun o( politiko\s no/mos peri\ t'  a)riste/ws kai\  lipota/ktou  diale/getai kai\ peri\ tw=n  a)/llwn w(sau/tws: a)ll' ou) peri\ tou=d'
h)\ tou=d'  no/mimo/n e)stin, a)lla\ ta\ me\n kaqo/lou

                prohgoume/nws, ta\ d'  u(popi/ptonta tou/twn e(pome/nws. kai\ ga\r to\  timh=sai to/nde tina\  h)risteuko/ta kai\ to\  kola/sai to/nde tina\  lipotakth/santa no/mimon
a)\n  fh/saimen, w(s duna/mei kai\ peri\ tou/twn  diatetagme/nou tou= no/mou: o(\n tro/pon o(  i)atriko\s kai\ o(
  gumnastiko\s w(s ei)pei=n no/mos duna/mei ta\ kaq' e(/kasta toi=s  o(/lois  sumperilamba/nei: ou(/tw de\ kai\ o( th=s
 fu/sews no/mos ta\ me\n kaqo/lou prohgoume/nws, ta\ de\
 kaq' e(/kasta e(pome/nws. e)/sti q' ei(marme/na tro/pon tina\ kai\ tau=ta,  o)/nt' e)kei/nois  suneimarme/na, ta/xa
d' a)/n tis tw=n  a)/gan  a)kribologoume/nwn ta\ toiau=ta
 kai/ tou)nanti/on  fai/h  prohgou/mena  sunteta/xqai ta\ kaq' e(/kasta, ei)=nai/ te tou/twn e(/neka kai\ to\ kaqo/lou,  prohgei=sqai de\ tw=n e(/neka/ tou to\ ou(= e(/neka. a)lla\ peri\ me/n tou/twn e)n  a)/llois skepte/on. o(/ti d' ou) pa/nta  kaqarw=s ou)de\ diarrh/dhn h( ei(marme/nh perie/xei a)ll'
 o(/sa kaqo/lou, tou=to dh\ e)n tw=|  paro/nti  r(hqe\n pro/s
te to\n e(ch=s lo/gon kai\ to\n  o)li/gon  e)/mprosqen  xw/ran
 e)/xei. to\ me\n ga\r w(risme/non  oi)kei=on th=| qei/a|  fronh/sei
e)n tw=| kaqo/lou ma=llon qewrei=tai: toiou=to kai\ o( qei=os no/mos, o( me/ntoi ge  politiko/s, to\ d'
 a)/peiron e)n tw=| kaq' e(/kasta meta\ dh\ tau=ta, oi(=on
me/n e)stin e)c u(poqe/sews: o(/ti de\ toiou=ton kai\ h( ei(marme/nh,
oi)e/sqw. e)c u(poqe/sews dh\ e)/famen to\ mh\ kaq'  e(auto\  tiqe/menon, a)lla/ pws e(te/rw|  tini\ w(s a)lhqw=s  u(poteqe/n, o(po/sa  a)kolouqi/an shmai/nei.  toiou=ton me\n dh\ to\ e)c u(poqe/sews a(/ma kai\ kaqo/lou. o(/ti de\ kai\ h( ei(marme/nh toiou=ton
 tugxa/nei  o)/n, e)/k te th=s ou)si/as au)th=s kai\ e)k th=s  proshgori/as dh=lon. ei(marme/nh te ga\r prosagoreu/etai w(s
a)\n  ei)rome/nh tis:  qesmo\s de\ kai\ no/mos u(pa/rxei tw=| ta\ a)ko/louqa toi=s gignome/nois  politikw=s  diateta/xqai.

e(ch=s de\ skepte/on kai\ ta\ kata\ to\ pro/s ti,
pw=s me\n pro\s th\n pro/noian h( ei(marme/nh: e)/xei, pw=s
de\ pro\s th\n tu/xhn kai\ to\ g' e)f' h(mi=n kai\ to\ e)ndexo/menon
kai\ o(/sa toiau=ta: pro\s de\ tou/tw|  diwri/sqw,
ph= me\n a)lhqe\s ph= de\  yeu=dos to\  
               
                ei) me\n ou)=n to\ e)n th=| ei(marme/nh| pa/nta perie/xesqai dhloi=,  sugxwrhte/on ei)=nai a)lhqe/s: ei)/q' o(/sa peri\  a)nqrw/pous ei)/te peri\ gh=n a(/panta ei)/te kat' ou)rano\n gigno/mena, bou/letai/ tis e)n th=| ei(marme/nh|  ti/qesqai, kai\ tau=q' w(s pro\s to\ paro\n  sugkexwrh/sqw.

ei) d', o(/per kai\ ma=llon  e)mfai/nei, to\ kaq' ei(marme/nhn ou)x a(/panta, a)ll' au)to\ mo/non to\  e(po/menon
au)tw=| shmai/nei, ou) pa/nta r(hte/on kaq' ei(marme/nhn. ou)de\ ga\r  no/mima ou)de\ kata\ no/mon pa/nq' o(po/sa  periei/lhfen o( no/mos: kai\ ga\r  prodosi/an kai\

no/mimon  pro/stagma no/mou  e)sti/: to\ d''  ei)/per o( no/mos
 prosta/ttei, pw=s ou)k a)\n  a)peiqoi=en kai\  paranomoi=en
oi(/ ge mh\  a)risteu/ontes kai\  turannoktonou=ntes kai\
 o(/soi ta\ toiau=ta mh\  katorqou=sin; h)\ pw=s, ei)  para/nomoi  oi(/de, ou)  di/kaion  kola/zein tou\s  toiou/tous; ei)/
ge mh\n tau=ta lo/gon ou)k e)/xei, mo/na r(hte/on no/mima\
te kai\ kata\ no/mon ta\ u(po\ tou= no/mou  o(risqe/nt' e)pi\

                toi=s  o(pwsou=n  prattome/nois: mo/na d' ei(marme/na kai\ kaq' ei(marme/nhn ta\ a)ko/louqa toi=s e)n th=| qei/a|  diata/cei  prohghsame/nois.  w(/ste pa/nta me\n ta\ gigno/men'
h( ei(marme/nh perilamba/nei, polla\ de\ tw=n e)n au)th=| kai\ sxedo\n o(/sa  prohgei=tai ou)k  o)rqo\n le/gein
 kaq' ei(marme/nhn.

tou/twn d' ou(/tws  e)xo/ntwn, e(ch=s r(hte/on, w(s
to\ g' e)f' h(mi=n kai\ h( tu/xh to/ te dunato\n kai\ to\ e)ndexo/menon kai\ ta\ tou/twn suggenh=  taxqe/nta e)n toi=s  prohgoume/nois au)ta/ te  sw/|zoit' a)\n kai\ th\n ei(marme/nhn
  sw/|zoi. h( me\n ga\r ei(marme/nh pa/nta perie/xei  kaqa/per kai\ dokei=: ta\ d' ou)k e)c a)na/gkhs genh/setai,
 a)ll' e(/kaston au)tw=n oi(=on kai\  pe/fuken ei)=nai.  pe/fuke
de\ to\ dunato\n w(s  ge/nos  prou+festa/nai tou= e)ndexome/nou:
to\ d' e)ndexo/menon w(s  u(/lh tw=n e)f' h(mi=n
 prou+pokei=sqai: to\ d' e)f' h(mi=n w(s  ku/rion  xrh=sqai
tw=|  e)ndexome/nw|: h( de\ tu/xh  parempi/ptei tw=| e)f' h(mi=n dia\ th\n e)f'  e(ka/tera  r(oph\n tou= e)ndexome/nou. ma/qois
d' a)\n to\ lego/menon safw=s  e)nnoh/sas, w(s to\ gigno/menon  a(/pan kai\ h( ge/nesis au)th\ ou)  di/xa duna/mews,

               
h( de\ du/namis ou)k a)/neu ou)si/as, oi(=on a)nqrw/pou ei)/te ge/nesis ei)/te  genhto\n ou)k a)/neu th=s duna/mews,  au(/th

de\ peri\ a)/nqrwpon, ou)si/a d' o(  a)/nqrwpos. a)po\ de\ th=s duna/mews  metacu\ ou)/shs, h( me\n ou)si/a duna/menon,
h( de\ ge/nesis kai\ to\ gigno/menon a)/mfw  dunata/.  triw=n toi/nun tou/twn, duna/mews kai\ duname/nou kai\
 dunatou=, duna/mews me\n w(s to\ ei)=nai  prou+po/keitai
to\ duna/menon, dunatou= d' h( du/namis prou+fi/statai. safe\s me\n ou)=n kai\ ou(/tw to\ dunato/n: tu/pw| d' a)\n  a)forisqei/h koino/teron me\n to\ kata\ du/namin pefuko\s
gi/gnesqai,  kuriw/teron de\ tau)to\ tou=to,  o(po/tan

                mhde\n  e)/cwqen  e)/xh| pro\s to\ gi/gnesqai  e)mpodw/n. tw=n
de\  dunatw=n ta\ me\n ou)k a)\n  kwluqei/h pote/, w(/sper
ta\ kat'  ou)rano/n,  a)natolai\ kai\  du/seis kai\ ta\ tou/tois paraplh/sia: ta\ d' oi(=a/ te kwluqh=nai/ e)stin, w(s
polla\ me\n tw=n a)nqrwpi/nwn polla\ de\ kai\ tw=n  metarsi/wn.

ta\ me\n ou)=n  pro/ter' w(s e)c a)na/gkhs gigno/men'  a)nagkai=a prosagoreu/etai, a(\ de/ pws tou)nanti/on  e)pide/xetai e)ndexo/mena. a)fori/zoito d' a)\n kai\ tau=ta:
to\ me\n  a)nagkai=on dunato\n to\ a)ntikei/menon  a)duna/tw|,
 to\ d' e)ndexo/menon dunato/n, ou(= kai\ to\ a)ntikei/menon

dunato/n. to\ me\n ga/r katadu=nai to\n h(\lion a)nagkai=o\n
q' a(/ma kai\ dunato/n,  a)nti/keitai d'  a)du/naton
to\ mh\ katadu=nai: to\ de\  katadu/ntos  h(li/ou  o)/mbron
gene/sqai kai\ mh\ gene/sqai,  a)mfo/tera  dunata\ kai\ e)ndexo/mena. pa/lin de\ kai\ e)pi\ tou= e)ndexome/nou, to\
 me\n w(s e)pi\ to\  polu/, to\ d' w(s e)p' e)/latton, to\ d'
w(s e)pi/shs kai\  o(po/teron e)/tuxen: tou=to me\n fanero\n
w(s au)to\ au(tw=|  a)ntite/taktai, to\ de\ w(s e)pi\ to\ polu\
 kai\ e)p' e)/latton  a)llh/lois: kai\ tau=ta me\n e)pi\ th=| fu/sei to\  plei=ston, e)f' h(mi=n te to\ e)pi/shs. to\ me\n ga\r u(po\ ku/na  kau=m' h)\ yu=xos, w(=n to\ me\n w(s e)pi\
to\ polu\ to\ d' w(s e)p' e)/latton, th=| fu/sei a)/mfw u(pote/taktai:

               
to\: de\  peripatei=n kai\ mh\ kai\ o(/sa toiau=ta,
w(=n e(ka/teron e)pi\ th=|  a)nqrwpi/nh|  o(rmh=| u(pote/taktai,
o(\ dh\ e)f' h(mi=n kai\ kata\ proai/resin le/getai.  genikw/teron
de\ ma=llon to\ e)f' h(mi=n:  du/o ga\r ei)=nai  ei)/dh,
to\ t' e)k  pa/qous kai\  qumou= h)\  e)piqumi/as, to\ t' e)c
  e)pilogismou= h)\  dianoi/as, o(/per h)/dh kata\ proai/resin
a)/n tis ei)/poi. e)/xei de\ lo/gon mh\ to\ dunato\n kai\ e)ndexo/menon tou=to , o(/per kaq' o(rmh\n kai\ e)f' h(mi=n ei)/rhtai,
mh\ tau)to\ kat' a)/llo le/getai. kata\ me\n ga\r
to\ ma=llon dunato/n te kai\ e)ndexo/menon, kata\ de\ to\
 paro\n e)f' h(mi=n te kai\ kaq'  o(rmh/n. a)fori/zoito d' a)\n w(=de: to\ me\n e)ndexo/menon o(/per au)to/ te kai\ to\ a)ntikei/menon,
to\ d' e)f' h(mi=n qa/teron me/ros tou= e)ndexome/nou

to\ kata\ th\n  h(mete/ran o(rmh\n h)/dh gigno/menon. o(/ti me\n ou)=n to\ dunato\n tou= e)ndexome/nou pro/teron th=|
 fu/sei to\ d' e)ndexo/menon tou= e)f' h(mi=n prou+fi/statai, kai\ oi(=on au)tw=n tugxa/nei  o)\n e(/kaston kai\  po/qen  o)noma/zetai kai\ ta/ ge  parakei/mena au)toi=s, sxedo\n ei)/rhtai.

q.#text:
ou)de\ ta\ peri\ th=s di/khs  a)=ra  e)pu/qonto o(\n tro/pon  e)ge/neto; nai/: tau=ta me\n h(mi=n h)/ggeile/ tis: kai\  e)qauma/zome/n ge, o(/ti  pa/lai  genome/nhs; au)th=s u(/steron
 fai/netai  a)poqanw/n ti/ h)=n tou=to, w)=  *fai/dwn;
tu/xh tis au)tw=|, w)=  *)exe/krates, sune/bh: e)/tuxe ga\r th=|  proterai/a| th=s di/khs h(  pru/mna  e)stemme/nh tou=  ploi/ou,
o(\ ei)s  *dh=lon  *)aqhnai=oi  pe/mpousin

p.#text:
peri\ de\ th=s; tu/xhs kai\ tou= au)toma/tou kai\ ei)/
ti para\ tau=ta qewrei=tai, nu=n h(mi=n  lekte/on. ai)/tion

me\n dh/ ti h( tu/xh. tw=n d' ai)ti/wn ta\ me\n kaq'  au(ta/,

kai\ e(/n, to\ de\ kata\ sumbebhko\s ou)x e(/n te
 kai\  a)o/riston polla\ ga\r kai\  a)/peira tw=|  e(ni\ u(pa/rxei  panta/pasin  a)llh/lwn  diafe/ronta. to\ me/ntoi kata\ sumbebhko/s, o(/tan mh\ mo/non e)n toi=s e(/neka/ tou  gi/gnhtai,
 a)lla\ kai\ e)n oi(=s h( proai/resis,  to/te dh\ kai\ to\ a)po\ tu/xhs prosagoreu/etai: oi(=on to\  eu(rei=n  xrusi/on  ska/ptonq' i(/na  futeu/sh|, h)\  paqei=n ti h)\  dra=sai tw=n para\ to\  e)/qos  feu/gont' h)\  diw/kont' h)\ a)/llws  badi/zont'

 o(/per  sune/pesen, a)ll'  e(te/rou tino\s xa/rin. dio\ kai\ a)prono/hton ai)ti/an kai\ a)/dhlon a)nqrwpi/nw| logismw=| th\n tu/xhn  a)pe/dosan : tw=n  palaiw=n  e)/nioi. kata\ de\

kai\ to\  spa/nion kai\ para/logon  e)mfai/netai tw=| kata\ sumbebhko/s: oi(=on d' e)sti\ tou=to, ei) kai\ mh\ e)k tw=n

a)/n tis  a)rxh\n  kuriwta/thn par'  a)ndrw=n  froni/mwn  a)podexo/menos  o)rqo/tat'  a)pode/xoit' a)/n.  boulhqei\s

de\ ou)/t' h)=n ou)/t' e)/sti tw=|  a)ri/stw|  dra=n a)/llo plh\n

q: i(/na toi=s e)/peita ei)/h kaki/as a)nai/tios e(ka/stw|

q.#text:
i(/na th=s e)/peita ei)/h

kaki/as e(ka/stw| a)nai/tios:

e)pei\ tau=ta ei)/ pote/ tis  a)nqrw/pwn fu/sei  i(kano/s, qei/a|  moi/ra|  gennhqei/s,  paralabei=n  dunato\s ei)/h, no/mwn ou)de\n
a)\n  de/oito au(tou=  a)rco/ntwn:  e)pisth/mhs ga\r ou)/te no/mos ou)/te ta/cis  ou)demi/a  krei/ttwn, ou)de\ qe/mis e)sti\
  nou=n ou)deno\s  u(ph/koon ou)de\  dou=lon a)lla\ pa/ntwn  a)/rxonta ei)=nai ,  e)a/nper  a)lhqino\s e)leu/qero/s te  o)/ntws
h)=| kata\ fu/sin.

p.#text:
e)/stin ou)=n pro/noia h( me\n a)nwta/tw kai\  prw/th
 tou=  prw/tou  qeou= no/hsis, ei)/te kai\ bou/lhsis  ou)=sa  eu)erge/tis a(pa/ntwn, kaq' h(\n  prw/tws e(/kasta tw=n  qei/wn dia\ panto\s a)/rista/ te kai\ ka/llista  keko/smhtai. h(
de\ deute/ra  deute/rwn qew=n tw=n kat' ou)rano\n  i)o/ntwn,

 pro\s  diamonh\n kai\  swthri/an e(ka/stwn tw=n  genw=n.  tri/th d'  a)\n ei)ko/ti  r(hqei/h pro/noia/ te kai\  promh/qeia tw=n o(/soi peri\ gh=n  dai/mones  tetagme/noi tw=n a)nqrwpi/nwn  pra/cewn  fu/lake/s te kai\ e)pi/skopoi/  ei)si. tritth=s

de\ kai\ ma/lista th=s prw/ths  legome/nhs, ou)k a)\n  o)knh/saimen ei)pei=n, ei) kai\  filoso/fois  a)ndra/si  ta)nanti/a le/gein  do/caimen, w(s pa/nta me\n kaq' ei(marme/nhn kai\

me\n kata\ pro/noian kai\ a)/lla ge kat'  a)/llhn, e)/nia
de\ kaq' ei(marme/nhn: kai\ h( me\n ei(marme/nh pa/ntws kata\ pro/noian, h( de\ pro/noia  ou)damw=s kaq' ei(marme/nhn. e)/stw d'  o( lo/gos ta\ nu=n peri\ th=s prw/ths kai\ a)nwta/tw. to\ me\n  kata/ ti u(/steron  e)kei/nou, kaq' o(\

ti a)\n kai\  le/ghtai: oi(=on to\ kata\ no/mon tou= no/mou,
kai\ to\ kata\ fu/sin th=s fu/sews: ou(/tw de\ kai\ to\ kaq' ei(marme/nhn th=s ei(marme/nhs  new/teron a)\n ei)/h. h( d' a)nwta/tw pro/noia  presbu/taton a(pa/ntwn, plh\n  ou(=pe/r e)stin ei)/te bou/lhsis ei)/te no/hsis ei)/te kai\ e(ka/teron.

th/n ge  prw/thn  sunesthke/nai: ta\ d'  e)nteu=qen ou(/tw lego/mena  tau=ta ti/s ou)k a)\n diarrh/dhn kai\  safe/stat'  oi)hqei/h th\n ei(marme/nhn  dhlou=n, w(/sper tina\  ba/sin

h( kat' ou)si/an ei(marme/nh  o)rqw=s h(mi=n ei)s ta\s  trei=s  moi/ras  dianene/mhtai, kai\ o( th=s  a(lu/sews lo/gos ta\s

o( me\n ou)=n  h(me/teros lo/gos, e)pi\  kefalai/wn ei)pei=n, toiou=to/s tis a)\n ei)/h: o( de\ tou/twn  e)nanti/os
ou) mo/non e)n ei(marme/nh| a)lla\ kai\ kaq' ei(marme/nhn pa/nta  ti/qetai. pa/nta de\ qate/rw|  suna/|dei: ta\ de\ tw=| e(te/rw|  sunw|da\ dh=lon o(/ti kai\ qa/teron. kata\ me\n ou)=n

e)f' h(mi=n deu/teron: kai\ tri/ton h(/ te tu/xh kai\ to\ au)to/maton kai\ o(/sa kat' au)ta/:  e)/painos de\ kai\  yo/gos kai\ ta\ tou/twn suggenh=  te/tarta  pe/mpton de\ kai\

to\n lo/gon tugxa/nei o)/nta. kata\ de\ to\n  e)nanti/on ma/lista me\n kai\ prw=ton a)\n ei)=nai do/ceie, to\ mhde\n  a)naiti/ws gi/gnesqai a)lla\ kata\  prohgoume/nas  ai)ti/as: deu/teron

qew=n u(pa/rxousa: h( de\ tw=n  sofw=n pro\s ta\
  sumbai/nonta  eu)are/sthsis, w(s pa/nta kata\ moi=ran
 gigno/mena deute/ra. tri/ton de\ to\  poluqru/lhton tou=to, o(/ti pa=n  a)ci/wma h)\ a)lhqe/s e)stin h)\  yeude/s. tou/twn ge mh\n e)pi\  tosou=ton  e)mnh/sqhmen, i(/na w(s e)pi\  braxu\ ta\ th=s ei(marme/nhs  kefa/laia  dhlwqei/h

a(\ xrh\  diereunh/sasqai kata\ th\n  a)kribh=  ba/sanon e(kate/rou tw=n  lo/gwn, ta\ de\ kaq' e(/kasta tou/twn  e)sau=qis  me/timen.
